com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.plugin

Class SequenceSelection.SequenceIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.plugin.SequenceSelection.SequenceIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XMLSerializable.OldVersionCompatible
    Enclosing class:
    SequenceSelection

    public static class SequenceSelection.SequenceIndex
extends Object
implements XMLSerializable.OldVersionCompatible
    Represents the index of the selected sequence and the type (so that we can identify which list the index applies to in SequenceListDocuments. Refer to SequenceSelection for a discussion about what SequenceIndex means.
    Since:
    API 4.40 (Geneious 5.4.0)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SequenceSelection.SequenceIndex.SelectionWrongForDocumentsException
      Deprecated. 
      use SequenceSelectionWithDocuments.SelectedDocumentsModifiedException instead

    • Constructor Detail

      • SequenceSelection.SequenceIndex

        public SequenceSelection.SequenceIndex(int sequenceIndex,
                               SequenceType sequenceType,
                               SequenceSelection.SequenceDocumentType sequenceDocumentType)
        Creates a new SequenceIndex
        Parameters:
        sequenceIndex - the 0-based index of the sequence in the list. May be -1 for the consensus sequence (if it exists)
        sequenceType - the sequence type (so that we can identify which list the index applies to in SequenceListDocuments
        sequenceDocumentType - the type of document the selection applies to. Used for example to distinguish between the alignment or the sequence in a CombinedAlignmentAndSequenceDocument

        public Geneious.MajorVersion getVersionSupport(XMLSerializable.VersionSupportType versionType)

        Specified by:
        getVersionSupport in interface XMLSerializable.OldVersionCompatible
        Parameters:

      • toXML

        public org.jdom.Element toXML(Geneious.MajorVersion majorVersion,
                     ProgressListener progressListener)
        Description copied from interface: XMLSerializable.OldVersionCompatible
        Serializes this class to XML format, potentially to a format readable by an earlier version of Geneious. It is acceptable for the XML to include unnecessary tags that will be ignored by the earlier version. For example if the implementation has only extended the XML since the earlier version, then the XML returned may be identical to the XML returned for the current version.

        See XMLSerializable.toXML() for a more detailed description of what it means to serialize to XML.

        All classes that implement this method must also implement XMLSerializable.toXML() and should delegate back to this method using Geneious.getMajorVersion() and ProgressListener.EMPTY as parameters.

        Specified by:
        toXML in interface XMLSerializable.OldVersionCompatible
        Parameters:
        majorVersion - the major version of Geneious to serialize to XML for. For example "6.0" but not "6.0.0". This must be a version returned greater or equal to a version returned from getVersionSupport(VersionSupportType.OldestVersionSerializableTo) and must never be greater than the current version (Geneious.getMajorVersion())
        progressListener - for reporting progress and cancelling
        Returns:
        object encoded as a JDOM element

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • getSequence

        public SequenceDocument getSequence(List<AnnotatedPluginDocument> selectedDocuments)
                             throws DocumentOperationException
        Gets the selected sequence corresponding to this sequence index for these documents
        Parameters:
        selectedDocuments - the documents which this SequenceIndex corresponds to
        Returns:
        the sequence from the selected documents corresponding to this index. If the selected sequence in an alingment is the consensus sequence, this currently returns null, although this is expected to change in future versions.
        Throws:
        DocumentOperationException - if the document can't be loaded to retrieve the sequence corresponding to this selection
        SequenceSelection.SequenceIndex.SelectionWrongForDocumentsException - if this SequenceIndex object was invalid for the given documents
        See Also:
        getSequenceFromPluginDocuments(java.util.List)

      • getSequenceFromPluginDocuments

        public SequenceDocument getSequenceFromPluginDocuments(List<PluginDocument> selectedDocuments)
        Gets the selected sequence corresponding to this sequence index for these documents
        Parameters:
        selectedDocuments - the documents which this SequenceIndex corresponds to
        Returns:
        the sequence from the selected documents corresponding to this index. If the selected sequence in an alingment is the consensus sequence, this currently returns null, although this is expected to change in future versions.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if this selection index doesn't correspond to these documents.
        Since:
        API 4.40 (Geneious 5.4.0)
        See Also:
        getSequence(java.util.List)

      • getContainingDocumentIndex

        public int getContainingDocumentIndex(List<AnnotatedPluginDocument> selectedDocuments)
        Given a the List of AnnotatedPluginDocument on which this SequenceIndex was defined, returns the index of the document that this SequenceIndex refers to, in that list
        Parameters:
        selectedDocuments - the original documents for which this SequenceIndex's parent SequenceSelection was created
        Returns:
        the index of the document in the original List
        Throws:
        SequenceSelection.SequenceIndex.SelectionWrongForDocumentsException - if this SequenceIndex object was invalid for the given documents
        Since:
        API 4.40 (Geneious 5.4.0)
